zh.mysqlConfigTips: 请为mysql添加数据库连接配置在系统配置页面
zh.sqlserverConfigTips: 请为sqlserver添加数据库连接配置在系统配置页面
zh.noPrimaryKeyUnedit: 因为没有索引导致不能编辑!
zh.noPrimaryKeyUnDelete: 因为没有索引导致不能删除!

en.mysqlConfigTips: Please add the connection string to the system configuration of the site for the mysql
en.sqlserverConfigTips: Please add the connection string to the system configuration of the site for the sqlServer
en.noPrimaryKeyUnedit: Cannot edit because there is no primaryKey!
en.noPrimaryKeyUnDelete: Cannot delete because there is no primaryKey!
